text: "Inside the Fire" is a 2008 song by American alternative metal band Disturbed and is the leading single from their fourth studio album Indestructible. It went to number 73 in the United States. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 2009. ==Track listing== Compact disc 7" vinyl Digital download United Kingdom digital download Category:2008 songs Category:Disturbed (band) songs
title: Inside the Fire (song)
